info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 4:30PM MDT until July 04 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OTERO AND SOUTHEASTERN CROWLEY COUNTIES... At 430 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sugar City, or 17 miles northwest of La Junta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Ordway, Swink, Sugar City, Cheraw and Crowley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
